sentences.sCn: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.sContent: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.sCn: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.sContent: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.sCn: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

phrases.pCn: 嫂子；姑子；姨子；弟媳；妯娌
姐妹船，姊妹船；同型船；姊妹舰
同父异母或同母异父姐妹

words.tran: 姐妹之谊；姐妹关系；妇女团体（等于sisterhood）

trans.tranCn: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
trans.tranOther: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.
